datasetId.title: Dataset ID
datasetId.description: The ID of the Apify dataset from which data will be imported.

mongoUrl.title: MongoDB Connection URL
mongoUrl.description: The connection string to your MongoDB instance. Refer to the [MongoDB URI format](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/connection-string/) for details.

collection.title: MongoDB Collection Name
collection.description: The name of the MongoDB collection where the data will be stored.

uniqueKeys.title: Unique Document Keys
uniqueKeys.description: An array of field names to uniquely identify documents in the collection. If provided, documents with matching fields will be updated instead of inserted.
